It's probably caused by one of the third-party filter lists.
Please add these rules:
```adblock
@@||cdn.cxense.com/cx.cce.js$domain=euractiv.com
@@||cdn.cxense.com/cx.js$domain=euractiv.com
@@||api.cxense.com/public/widget/data?json=$domain=euractiv.com
```
to user rules.
